products.name: Stainless Steel Hip Flask
products.description: A classic stainless steel hip flask for carrying and sipping your favorite spirits.

products.name: Leather-Bound Flask
products.description: A flask with a leather cover, often used for a more elegant drinking experience.

products.name: Glass Flask
products.description: A glass flask suitable for carrying and preserving various liquids, including alcoholic beverages.

products.name: Travel Flask Set
products.description: A set that includes a flask, cups, and a carrying case for on-the-go enjoyment.

products.name: Flask Gift Set
products.description: A gift set that may include a flask, funnel, and shot glasses, often packaged in an elegant box.

products.name: Custom Engraved Flask
products.description: A flask that can be personalized with custom engravings or messages.
